Actions.Text: REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to establishing a campsite reservation preference for state residents
Summary: Establishes a campsite reservation preference for New York state residents to permit state residents an opportunity to reserve space in state parks before such reservations are accepted from non-state residents.
LawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
LawCode: Add ยง13.22, Pks & Rec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, in relation to campsite reservation preference for state residents
